00010 struct DString* dstInitCString( const char* str )
00011 {
00012         struct DString* ret = malloc( sizeof( struct DString ) );
00013         
00014         ret->length = strlen( str );
00015         ret->size = 64 + ret->length;
00016         ret->str = malloc( ret->size * sizeof( char ) );
00017         strcpy( ret->str, str );
00018         
00019         ret->noDel = 0;
00020         ret->lastFound = 0;
00021                 
00022         return ret;
00023 }

00026 struct DString* dstInitCString2( const char* str )
00027 {
00028         struct DString* ret = malloc( sizeof( struct DString ) );
00029         
00030         ret->size = ret->length = strlen( str );
00031         ret->str = str;
00032

00040 struct DString* dstInit( const char* fmt, ... ) {
00041         struct DString* ret = malloc( sizeof( struct DString ) );
00042         ret->noDel = 0;
00043         ret->size = 64;
00044         ret->lastFound = 0;
00045         ret->isLastTok = 0;
00046 
00047         if ( ( ret->str = malloc( ret->size ) ) == NULL ) {
00048                 return NULL;
00049         }
00050         
00051         int n;
00052         while ( 1 ) {
00053                 va_list ap;
00054                 va_start( ap, fmt );
00055                 n = vsnprintf( ret->str, ret->size, fmt, ap );
00056                 va_end( ap );
00057                 
00058                 /* If that worked, return the string. */
00059                 if ( n > -1 && n < ret->size ) {
00060                         ret->length = strlen( ret->str );
00061                         return ret;
00062                 }
00063                 
00064                 /* Else try again with more space. */
00065                 if ( n > -1 ) {
00066                         ret->size = n + 1;
00067                 } else {
00068                         return NULL;
00069                 }
00070                 
00071                 if ( ( ret->str = realloc( ret->str, ret->size ) ) == NULL ) {
00072                         return NULL;
00073                 }
00074         }
00075 }

00079 {

00082         ret->noDel = 1; 
00083         ret->length = strlen( string );
00084         ret->lastFound = 0;
00085                 
00086         return ret;

00090 void dstDel( struct DString* dstr )
00091 {
00092         if ( !dstr )
00093                 return;
00094         
00095         if ( !dstr->noDel ) {
00096                 free( dstr->str );
00097         }
00098         dstr->str = NULL;
00099         
00100         free( dstr );
00101         dstr = NULL;
00102 }

00105 void dstReset( struct DString* dstr )
00106 {
00107         if ( !dstr )
00108                 return;
00109         
00110         if ( dstr->str && dstr->length ) {
00111 //              memset( dstr->str, 0, dstr->size );
00112                 dstr->str[0] = 0;
00113         }
00114         dstr->length = 0;
00115 
00116         dstr->lastFound = 0;
00117         dstr->isLastTok = 0;
00118 }

00121 struct DString* dstAppendCString( struct DString* dstr, const char* string )
00122 {
00123         int curSpace = dstr->size - dstr->length -1;
00124         int nLen = strlen( string );
00125         
00126         if ( curSpace < nLen ) {
00127                 dstr->size *= 2;
00128                 dstr->str = realloc( dstr->str, dstr->size );
00129         }
00130         
00131         strcpy( dstr->str+dstr->length, string );
00132         dstr->length += nLen;
00133         
00134         return dstr;
00135 }

00137 
00138 struct DString* dstAppend( struct DString* dstr, const char* fmt, ... )
00139 {
00140         int curSpace = dstr->size - dstr->length -1;
00141         
00142         int n;
00143         while ( 1 ) {
00144                 char* curStr = dstr->str + dstr->length;
00145                 
00146                 va_list ap;
00147                 va_start( ap, fmt );
00148                 n = vsnprintf( curStr, curSpace, fmt, ap );
00149                 va_end( ap );
00150                 
00151                 /* If that worked, return the string. */
00152                 if ( n > -1 && n < curSpace ) {
00153                         dstr->length += n;
00154                         return dstr;
00155                 }
00156                 
00157                 /* Else try again with more space. */
00158                 if ( n > -1 ) {
00159                         dstr->size += n;
00160                         curSpace = n + 1;
00161                 } else {
00162                         return NULL;
00163                 }
00164                 
00165                 if ( ( dstr->str = realloc( dstr->str, dstr->size + curSpace +1 ) ) == NULL ) {
00166                         return NULL;
00167                 }
00168         }
00169 }

00172 char dstGetLastChar( struct DString* dstr )
00173 {
00174         return dstr->str[dstr->length-1];
00175 }

00177 
00178 const char* dstTok( struct DString* dstr, const char* delimeters )
00179 {
00180         char* string = dstr->str + dstr->lastFound;
00181         for( int i = 0; i < (dstr->length - dstr->lastFound); ++i ) {
00182                 for( int k = 0; delimeters[k]; ++k ) {
00183                         if( string[i] == delimeters[k] ) {
00184                                 string[i] = 0;
00185                                 dstr->lastFound += i+1;
00186                                 
00187                                 return string;
00188                         }
00189                 }
00190                 
00191         }
00192         
00193         if ( dstr->lastFound < dstr->length ) {
00194                 dstr->lastFound = dstr->length;
00195                 return string;
00196         }
00197         
00198         return NULL;
00199 }

00201 
00202 const char* dstTok2( struct DString* dstr, const char* delimeters )
00203 {
00204         int founded = 0, oldFounded;
00205         char* string = dstr->str + dstr->lastFound;
00206         for( int i = 0; i < (dstr->length - dstr->lastFound); ++i ) {
00207                 oldFounded = founded;
00208                 int k = 0;
00209                 for( ; delimeters[k]; ++k ) {
00210                         if( string[i] == delimeters[k] ) {
00211                                 string[i] = 0;
00212                                 
00213                                 ++founded;
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216                 
00217                 if ( founded == oldFounded )
00218                         founded = oldFounded = 0;
00219                 
00220                 if ( founded == k ) {
00221                         dstr->lastFound += i+1;
00222                         dstr->isLastTok = 0;
00223                         return string;
00224                 }
00225         }
00226         
00227         if ( dstr->lastFound < dstr->length ) {
00228                 dstr->isLastTok = 1;
00229                 dstr->lastFound = dstr->length;
00230                 return string;
00231         }
00232         
00233         return NULL;
00234 }
